name: Ghost Artifact Prototype
description:
What's that? Seems like you just received a new message.

You play as Shutter Shaker. Your online friends have been reminiscing about the last time you all met in real life. However, something seems a bit off with that old photo you took...

Discover the contradictions in your friends' recollections within a simulated online messaging service.  Learn the truth behind the photo and reveal what your friends are really thinking.

Ghost Artifact is a humorous visual novel averaging about 30 minutes in length depending on how much time the player spends on the puzzles. This story is fiction. Any similarity to specific events, people or software is coincidental. Full content warning included in-game.

This visual novel was improvised in one month as a prototype for a longer project. If you are interested in seeing a longer version come to fruition, please don't hesitate to let us know in the comments, share with your friends, donate if you can, and complete this survey once you're done with the game.

Music by @boza44
Ren'Py Chat Log tool by John-Michael O'Brien @PoorLifeChoices
